h2.a: School Buildings Closed - No Device/Other Item/Medication Pickup

District 34 has learned of a reported case of COVID-19 and will provide more information when available.

h2.a: Actualizaciones sobre comidas escolares y despensa de alimentos / School Meals and Food Pantry Updates

div.div:
Mientras la escuela está cerrada, las comidas escolares están disponibles para recoger en Attea para los estudiantes elegibles.
While school is closed, school meals are available for pickup at Attea for eligible students.
- Read More -

School buildings are closed March 16-March 30. E-Learning Days start March 18.
- Read More -

District 34 are open on Friday, March 13. Schools will be closed March 16-March 30. The Library and Park District will close as well.
- Read More -

h2.a: D34 Cancels All Non-Essentials Activities, Programs & Events

div.div:
District 34 has cancelled non-essential activities, programs and events until April 5.
- Read More -

Glenview and Northbrook collaborate to plan and share information and resources surrounding the novel coronavirus, and to provide accurate, consistent and clear information to citizens. Visit the new website.

h2.a: March Issue of D34 Parent News / el número de marzo de D34 Noticias Para Padres

div.div:
D34 Parent News is your source to learn about initiatives, activities and programs across the District, and out in the community.
D34 Noticias Para Padres es su fuente para aprender sobre iniciativas, actividades y programas en todo el Distrito y en la comunidad.
- Read More -

h2.a: Board Briefs for the 2-24-2020 Board of Education Meeting

div.div:
Board Briefs is a newsletter-style overview of the Board of Education's discussion and action. See a summary of the February 24 meeting.

Online registration for the 2020-2021 school year is open.

h2.a: Building Future: Board Approves Resolution for Referendum

div.div:
$119M resolution includes funds for infrastructure repairs, building renovations and additions to increase space and allow for full-day kindergarten.
- Read More -

District 34 will add 20 minutes to the school day and implement Late Start Wednesday for the 2020-2021 school year.
- Read More -

The Building Future Task Force recommends that District place a referendum on ballot for the March 2020 election.
- Read More -

Please read the guidelines that District 34 uses in making decisions about closing school because of inclement weather.
- Read More -

h2.a: Culver's Fundraiser for The Gelfand Fund

div.div:
Visit Culver's in Glenview on October 1, October 4 and November 5 and when you mention "Gelfand Fundraiser," 20% of your purchase benefits D34 students and families in need.
- Read More -

A task force of stakeholders held its first meeting as part of the community-wide process of determining District 34's facility needs and how best to meet them.
